issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Support additional types in math functions.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9822](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9822). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Would it be possible to adding support for these functions with types other than decimal128?

 \* abs with int64, float64
 \* ceil with float64
 \* floor with float64
 \* round with float64

Additionally, could sqrt [with int64 & float64] be implemented? This one is easy to work around, but would be convenient.
